Ralph,
 
Welcome, any questions you have about the boxes or the research p=
lease feel free to ask.
I will be glad to help in any way I can.
 
Bruce
Br=
uce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: ecuyler@...: Sat=
, 19 Jan 2008 15:28:10 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: New member here !!




-=
-- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "ghostthostt" <Ralphsmi@...> wrote:>> Hi all=
,> > I'm a new member of the group and I am an Investigator of the > Parano=
rmal here in central PA. My group's name is SPIRIT Paranormal > Investigati=
on Team. I have been doing this in groups now for 6 years.> I had my own gr=
oup H.I.P.S. (Harrisburg Independent Paranormal > Society) and now I am in =
the SPIRIT group out of Selinsgrove,PA. I > also use to be with Kelly Weave=
r's group Capital Ghost Forum which is > now called Spirit Society of PA. I=
 had to leave her group because of > my work schedule. I have been on Ghost=
 Investigations with TAPS to > Waverly Hills Sanatorium,Ky, Eastern State P=
ennitentiary in PA. I > have > also investigated St. Augustine Lighthouse i=
n Fla. I did have a > chance > to meet Bill Murphy here in Gettysburg,PA. o=
n the Battlefield near > the > Wheatfield last year for a short time. He is=
 a nice guy. I let him > listen to some of my EVP's from the Wheatfield and=
 Triangular Field > that day we met. I have been called an " EVP Medium " b=
y my peers. I > have a ton of them. I would like to thank "Frank Sumption" =
for his > inspiring work with his boxes and giving of his time and knowledg=
e to > inspire us to do our own research to find the answers we are all > l=
ooking for in this world. Thanks, Frank for your inspiration and > hard > w=
ork we all appreciate it. I would also like to thank "Sum Duck" > and "Mike=
 Coletta" for coming up with those Hacks that made it easy > for me and all=
 the others out there that are Electronically > illiterate.> Thank you guys=
 we all appreciate it too. Oh well I just wanted to put > my two cents in t=
o let you know I'm with you all. Oh, I have two 12-> 469's the first one I =
broke trying to hack it LOL. The other one > works > great. I also have the=
 12-470(old model) which I tried to hack but I > cut the wrong wire. I cut =
the green wire (seventh wire from the top > as > Mike said to do)and when I=
 put everything back together I had no AM > Band LOL. So I opened it up aga=
in and was thinking to myself should I > cut the wire before the green one =
I had cut or should I cut the wire > after the green one. Hmmmm, I thought =
here goes nothing so I cut the > yellow wire after the green one number eig=
ht from the top. I put it > together as I was crossing my fingers, I tried =
the FM band and bingo > it worked great. Just a funny story of how electron=
ically illiterate > I > am. I do want to say I do hear alot of voices comin=
g across these > boxes. I hear them saying their names and sometimes it sou=
nds like > they are talking to each other. I have gotten answers to questio=
ns > too. Yesterday at my work place I like to listen to it while I'm > wor=
king here at the Post Office. I heard a male voice say to me "Do > you want=
 a Tech ?" I also hear the name Lisa alot and they > say "seven" > alot too=
. My name has been called alot too. So there has to be > something to these=
 boxes. Oh I also had one say " Hurry dead battery "> which my batteries di=
d die a few minutes later which was cool. I was > recording with my voice r=
ecorder and picked that up. They say some > funny things sometimes too. I d=
id hear one say to me " F__k Off " I > know that wasn't on any radio progra=
m LOl. Oh well you have a great > set up here and it is nice to meet you al=
l. Take care and keep up the > great work you all are doing in your researc=
hes. Bye for now !!> > Regards,> > Ralph Smith of "SPIRIT" Paranormal Inves=
tigation Team !!!!>Hi Ralph! I'm new here too. Been lurking in the shadows =
reading andlearning, trying to soak up all of the info that I can. My name =
isJeremy Bowlin and I live in Dayton, Ohio. I'm an investigator withthe Day=
ton Ghost Hunter's Society. I don't have any experience with the box resear=
ch at this time. I'veyet to get a box to begin research. Been spending a lo=
t of timeworking on ideas and learning all I can before I begin. Jeremy 


=

--- In <A href=3D"mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogr=
oups.com">EVP-ITC@yahoogroups<WBR>.com</A>, "ghostthostt" <Ralphsmi@..<W=
BR>.> wrote:<BR>><BR>> Hi all,<BR>> <BR>> I'm a new member o=
f the group and I am an Investigator of the <BR>> Paranormal here in cen=
tral PA. My group's name is SPIRIT Paranormal <BR>> Investigation Team. =
I have been doing this in groups now for 6 years.<BR>> I had my own grou=
p H.I.P.S. (Harrisburg Independent Paranormal <BR>> Society) and now I a=
m in the SPIRIT group out of Selinsgrove,<WBR>PA. I <BR>> also use to be=
 with Kelly Weaver's group Capital Ghost Forum which is <BR>> now called=
 Spirit Society of PA. I had to leave her group because of <BR>> my work=
 schedule. I have been on Ghost Investigations with TAPS to <BR>> Waverl=
y Hills Sanatorium,Ky, Eastern State Pennitentiary in PA. I <BR>> have <=
BR>> also investigated St. Augustine Lighthouse in Fla. I did have a <BR=
>> chance <BR>> to meet Bill Murphy here in Gettysburg,PA. on the Bat=
tlefield near <BR>> the <BR>> Wheatfield last year for a short time. =
He is a nice guy. I let him <BR>> listen to some of my EVP's from the Wh=
eatfield and Triangular Field <BR>> that day we met. I have been called =
an " EVP Medium " by my peers. I <BR>> have a ton of them. I would like =
to thank "Frank Sumption" for his <BR>> inspiring work with his boxes an=
d giving of his time and knowledge to <BR>> inspire us to do our own res=
earch to find the answers we are all <BR>> looking for in this world. Th=
anks, Frank for your inspiration and <BR>> hard <BR>> work we all app=
reciate it. I would also like to thank "Sum Duck" <BR>> and "Mike Colett=
a" for coming up with those Hacks that made it easy <BR>> for me and all=
 the others out there that are Electronically <BR>> illiterate.<BR>> =
Thank you guys we all appreciate it too. Oh well I just wanted to put <BR>&=
gt; my two cents in to let you know I'm with you all. Oh, I have two 12-<BR=
>> 469's the first one I broke trying to hack it LOL. The other one <BR>=
> works <BR>> great. I also have the 12-470(old model) which I tried =
to hack but I <BR>> cut the wrong wire. I cut the green wire (seventh wi=
re from the top <BR>> as <BR>> Mike said to do)and when I put everyth=
ing back together I had no AM <BR>> Band LOL. So I opened it up again an=
d was thinking to myself should I <BR>> cut the wire before the green on=
e I had cut or should I cut the wire <BR>> after the green one. Hmmmm, I=
 thought here goes nothing so I cut the <BR>> yellow wire after the gree=
n one number eight from the top. I put it <BR>> together as I was crossi=
ng my fingers, I tried the FM band and bingo <BR>> it worked great. Just=
 a funny story of how electronically illiterate <BR>> I <BR>> am. I d=
o want to say I do hear alot of voices coming across these <BR>> boxes. =
I hear them saying their names and sometimes it sounds like <BR>> they a=
re talking to each other. I have gotten answers to questions <BR>> too. =
Yesterday at my work place I like to listen to it while I'm <BR>> workin=
g here at the Post Office. I heard a male voice say to me "Do <BR>> you =
want a Tech ?" I also hear the name Lisa alot and they <BR>> say "seven"=
 <BR>> alot too. My name has been called alot too. So there has to be <B=
R>> something to these boxes. Oh I also had one say " Hurry dead battery=
 "<BR>> which my batteries did die a few minutes later which was cool. I=
 was <BR>> recording with my voice recorder and picked that up. They say=
 some <BR>> funny things sometimes too. I did hear one say to me " F__k =
Off " I <BR>> know that wasn't on any radio program LOl. Oh well you hav=
e a great <BR>> set up here and it is nice to meet you all. Take care an=
d keep up the <BR>> great work you all are doing in your researches. Bye=
 for now !!<BR>> <BR>> Regards,<BR>> <BR>> Ralph Smith of "SPIR=
IT" Paranormal Investigation Team !!!!<BR>><BR><BR>Hi Ralph! I'm new her=
e too. Been lurking in the shadows reading and<BR>learning, trying to soak =
up all of the info that I can. My name is<BR>Jeremy Bowlin and I live in Da=
yton, Ohio. I'm an investigator with<BR>the Dayton Ghost Hunter's Society. =
<BR><BR>I don't have any experience with the box research at this time. I'v=
e<BR>yet to get a box to begin research. Been spending a lot of time<BR>wor=
king on ideas and learning all I can before I begin. <BR><BR>Jeremy<BR><BR>=
<BR></DIV><SPAN style=3D"COLOR: white"></SPAN>
